newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt says seeks 50,000T French or Australia wheat. [CORRECTED 21:25 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Egypt says seeks 50,000T French or Australia wheat. [CORRECTED 21:25 GMT]

text.p: Egypt's official commodities buyer said on Tuesday he was inviting bids for 50,000 (corrects from 500,000) tonnes of soft red French wheat or soft white standard wheat from Australia for delivery between November 1 and 15.
Samir Shakankiri, vice chairman of the state's General Authority for Supply Commodities, told Reuters the deadline for the bids was 1400 local/1200 GMT on Friday.
He also said the authority had the right to cancel the invitation at any time.
